scripts.bootstrap-nix: yarn && spago init && spago install halogen && yarn2nix > yarn.nix && spago2nix generate
scripts.full-clean: rm -rf node_modules output .spago dist/* *.lock spago-packages.nix yarn.nix .spago2nix .cache spago.dhall packages.dhall
scripts.bundle: spago bundle-app --main Main --to dist/smos-web-server-front.js && parcel build assets/*.html
